name: Bubble Trouble (itch) (PepperBoi)
description:
Made in 3 days for the Indie Tales game jam with the theme One Room and Mini-Jam with the theme bubbles and the limitation You Are Your Own ammo. 

How to play:

- Move with Arrows or WASD

- Shoot with mouse

- How to play with space

- Pop the bubbles before they get to the top

Credit:

SFX: Chiptone

Music: BeepBox

Art: Aseprite

Engine: Godot

Font: Thaleah Fat

POST HIGHSCORE IN COMMENTS
